Description:
The VBSO conducted its fourth point prevalence study (PPS) in partnerships with the VDH on Friday, 2020-11-20, testing 1,532 inmates, deputies and civilian staff. Those test results are as follows:
Of the 83 inmates who tested positive, 42 are new cases and 41 previously tested positive. At the recommendation of the VDH, everyone will be retested on 2020-12-04, for full information on these test results and the VBSO's response, visit vbso.net/news.
